about_the_game:
Gear up for summer! Dream of Mirror Online is proud to announce another special summer DLC where you can get a free taste of some Summer swag to help you keep cool during this hot summer! Deck yourself out in style with brand new swimsuits, surfboards and more!

Contains the following items:

Ice Cream - 7 days
Sunscreen - 7 days
Supersoaker - 7 days
Snorkel - 14 days
Sharkbite Surfboard - 7 days
Radical Surfboard - 7 days
Retro Surfboard - 7 days
Magma Surfboard - 7 days
Hawaiian Surfboard - 7 days
Jungle Surfboard - 7 days
Beach Ball - 7 days
Beach Umbrella - 7 days

name: Dream Of Mirror Online: Misc Summer Fun DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/2000/98
  • Processor: 1000 Mhz Intel P3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce2 MX/Radeon 7500 or equivalent 64mb VGA Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/2000/98
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce FX/AMD Radeon 9600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gear up for summer! Dream of Mirror Online is proud to announce another special summer DLC where you can get a free taste of some Summer swag to help you keep cool during this hot summer! Deck yourself out in style with brand new swimsuits, surfboards and more!
